email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Hope you're doing well.

We have a vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao. The vessel MV OCEAN TRADER is currently open and can accommodate 180,000 MT. Laycan is 15-20 October. Indicative freight rate is $25/MT, CIF terms.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Jason Miller
Sea Brokers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Jason,

Thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate seems a bit high. We are seeing rates closer to $22/MT in the market. Can you adjust the rate?

Also, could you provide the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best,
Laura Smith
Cargo Transport Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thanks for your response. The MV OCEAN TRADER has a DWT of 182,000 and an LOA of 300 meters. I can bring the rate down to $23.50/MT, which is very competitive given the current market conditions.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Jason,

$23.50/MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan and send over the contract details. Also, what is the demurrage rate?

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Great! The laycan remains 15-20 October. Demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. I will send the contract details shortly.

Best regards,
Jason

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Jason,

Thanks for the confirmation. We will proceed with the booking. Please send the contract as soon as possible.

Best,
Laura
